title: kaDavuLai maravaadhE
sahitya:
kaDavuLai maravAdE (nannenjE) unran kaDamaiyai turavAdE anbuk

(kaDavuLai)



anupallavi



maDamaiyaip-pOkkavum manam magizhvAkkavum

iDargaLai nIkkavum innaruL tEkkavum 

(kaDavuLai)



caraNam



varumaiyinAl pala shirumai vandAlum vAzhvinilE mighat-tAzhvu

vandAlum

porumaiyinAr-pugazh pongi vandAlum pulavalarAl perum pEru

vandAlum 

(kaDavuLai)
